an5.134:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato raja khattiyo muddhavasitto yassam yassam disayam viharati, sakasmimyeva vijite viharati.
an5.134:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, raja khattiyo muddhavasitto ubhato sujato hoti matito ca pitito ca, samsuddhagahaniko, yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena;
an5.134:2.4: balava kho pana hoti caturanginiya senaya samannagato assavaya ovadapatikaraya;
an5.134:2.5: parinayako kho panassa hoti pandito viyatto medhavi patibalo atitanagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetum;
an5.134:2.7: So imina yasapancamena dhammena samannagato yassam yassam disayam viharati, sakasmimyeva vijite viharati.
an5.134:3.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yassam yassam disayam viharati, vimuttacittova viharati.
an5.134:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu—
an5.134:3.5: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha—
an5.134:3.6: rajava khattiyo muddhavasitto addho mahaddhano mahabhogo paripunnakosakotthagaro;
an5.134:3.7: araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu—
an5.134:3.9: pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya—
an5.134:3.12: So imina vimuttipancamena dhammena samannagato yassam yassam disayam viharati vimuttacittova viharati.
